<<<<<<< HEAD
The substance of several sermons, from John, ix. 39 Preach'd at the request of a friend, and now publish'd for the benefit of the publick. By Nathanael Wyles, an unworthy labourer in Christ's vineyard. Wyles, Nathaniel.
63, [1], 44 p.
Printed for the author, and sold at his house in Shadwel, London : 1698.
Errata on D8v. "A funeral sermon" has caption title and separate pagination; register begins with B1. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
